short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides project in the FAB market by seller name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing sellers you’d rather avoid while shopping online? With FAB Seller Filter, you can customize your browsing experience in Epic Game's FAB Marketplace by easily hiding sellers you don’t want to see. Whether you're comparing prices, hunting for deals, or just want to streamline your search results, this extension allows you to filter out unwanted sellers and focus only on the ones that matter to you. Stay focused, save time, and shop smarter with FAB Seller Filter.

Key Features:

Effortlessly hide sellers from search results
Create a personalized list of sellers to block
Simple and user-friendly interface
